Articles.Content:
This challenge is very simple, but still very hard to get done.

The challenge :

(1) Take an asteroid from kerbol orbit and get it to kerbin orbit

(2) Equip the asteroid with many fuel tanks and engines

(3) Take the asteroid spaceship to eeloo

You can refuel as many times as you want and are allowed to use planets to slingshot yourself.

100 points if you get to eeloo

50 points for every planet (exluding kerbin) you visit on the journey

100 points if you manage to land the asteroid on eeloo (nearly impossible)

There will also be points on if you use a larger asteroid than a small one, but i do not really know which asteroid type is

named which because i have not updated ksp yet.

As soon as i update ksp i'll too do this challenge,

good luck everyone.
I think you should try the challenge yourself before you post it. You can use that experience in better assessment of what is and what is not possible or how hard individual parts are.

Just updated ksp, and it have experimented with asteroids, and i have already managed to set a big rocket on a small asteroid and get it to dres, so i can't see how this is impossible.

And if you can refuel as many times as you want, well it isn't that hard then.

100 points if you manage to land the asteroid on eeloo (nearly impossible)

It is possible. Try to land, and if you are at "low" speed(~200 m/s), just drop it. It will survive.

Also it would be handy if you complete this yourself so you can see what's possible and what's not.
